catList: This course will introduce students how to make more effective people decisions. The aim of the course will be to make key appointments easier through good people decisions. In a comprehensive and practical way, the course will use and provide simple methodology to provide what one needs to know about hiring, evaluating and promoting (senior) talent, including such topics as: •	The Success Formula in People Decisions •	Why Great People Decisions Are So Hard •	What to Look For •	Where to Look •	How to Appraise People •	How To Attract and Motivate the Best People •	Knowing When a Change Is Needed
